plot: This light hearted musical series features family entertainer Eric Nagler as a musician and single parent living in a trailer park with his pre-teen daughter Kaley, who wants to be a dancer...
plot_en: This light hearted musical series features family entertainer Eric Nagler as a musician and single parent living in a trailer park with his pre-teen daughter Kaley, who wants to be a dancer...
plot_es: This light hearted musical series features family entertainer Eric Nagler as a musician and single parent living in a trailer park with his pre-teen daughter Kaley, who wants to be a dancer...
title: Eric's World
